this_title: Bury Us in a Lone Desert
trans_title: 将我们埋葬在孤独的沙漠中
introduction: When a burglary takes an awkward turn, a young thief encounters an old man seeking a fatal reunion with his wife. Following the perspective of the thief, we witness his journey of emotions: from getting caught up in an absurd situation to growing a kin-like bond to the old man before fulfilling his final wish. Through this implausible journey, love unfolds with genuine simplicity and a bittersweet ending.
chinese_title: 将我们埋葬在孤独的沙漠中
foreign_title: Bury Us in a Lone Desert
